title: National Folk Festival. Part 2
brief_description: Shows scenes of folk dances performed at the National Folk festival in St Louis. The film includes Polish, English, Croatian, American Indian, Lithuanian, Ukrainian, Texas and Tennessee dances together with African American and Yugoslav songs.
